question:
Fill in the blanks with tobe (am/ is/ are).    For example : My mother ... beautiful.
 My mother is beautiful.
 (She)
1.My friends ... in the library.

2.I and my brothers ... at our uncle home.

3.My sisters ... diligent and smart.

4.My aunts ... kind and beuatiful.

5.The tiger ... wild.

6.The sharpener ... sharp.

7.Anton and Andi ... in the field.

8.My niece ... still baby.

9.The teachers ... in the classroom.

10.My grandmother and my grandfather ... at our home.

pliss dijawab
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. is

2. are

3. is

4. is

5. is

6. is

7. are

8. is

9. are

10. are

related_questions.question:
38. A part of songs which tells the story is called..    A. Chorus
B. Pre-chorus
C. Verse
D. Coda

39. A part of songs which is also called as tail is.. 
A. Chorus
B. Pre-chorus
C. Verse
D. Coda

40.A part songs which usually repeated in a song is... 
A. Chorus
B. Pre-chorus
C. Verse
D. Coda



Bantu jawab​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

38.C. Verse

Penjelasan=A verse is a repeated section of a song that typically features a new set of lyrics on each repetition. ... And while choruses typically contain a song's signature musical motif, the music of a verse is often written to complement the chorus music.

39.D. Coda

penjelasan=Coda is an Italian word for "tail," it is the additional lines of a song which brings it to a close. The coda is an optional addition to a song.

40.A. Chorus

penjelasan=When a distinction is made, the chorus is the part that contains the hook or the "main idea" of a song's lyrics and music, and there is rarely variation from one repetition of the chorus to the next

related_questions.question:
Read the following text to answer questions number 15 to 17. Last month, I sent to Surabaya with my friends for vacation. We went there on a night bus. When we arrived in Lamongan, the bus stopped at a small restaurant for a rest. I got off the bus to get a cup of ginger tea, and my friend drank some cold lemonade. Then I went to the toilet. It tool only a few minutes. When I came out again, the bus was not there, it had gone! My friends were not there too. Feeling shocked and confused. I asked a waiter About the bus. She said the bus departed about five minutes ago. I tried to call my friend on my phone, but the battery as running low. I could not do anything but hope and pray. After several minutes, my wish came true. The bus came back! I got on the bus and walked to my seat. I was so ashamed when everybody on the bus looked at me. I could feel my face turn red. 15. What is the best title of the text above? *     A. My vacation.
B. Vacation with my family.
C. Vacation to Surabaya.
D. Vacation to foreign Country.
Last month I went to Surabaya with my friends for vacation..." This part belongs to . . . . *
A. Orientation
B. Series of events
C. Reorientation
D. Setting of time and place
The bus was not there it had gone!" The word "it" in the second paragraph refers to . . . *
A. The writer
B. The bus
C. The waiter
The cold lemonade
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. A. my vacation

2. D. Setting of time and place

3. B. The bus

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu :)
